summary: Adds a variety of saddles and armors for Arvak.
descriptionHtml:
Did you ever thought about how it would be to ride on such a bony horse? We'll fear not, now your dragonborn won't have to fear such hazards anymore!

This mods adds a variety of saddles and/or armors to choose from for Arvak:

[list]
[*]Vanilla
[*]Craftable Barding
[/list]
Requirements
Installation
Compatibility
author: Othienka
